title: Mcpnotes
description: MCP Notes Server is an AI-powered note-taking application using MCP protocol with secure DynamoDB storage and integration with tools such as Claude Desktop.
creator: 9Ninety

DYNAMODB_URI.description: The connection string to the DynamoDB instance, e.g., dynamodb://access_key:secret_key@region/table

AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: Your AWS access key ID for connecting to DynamoDB.

AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: Your AWS secret access key for connecting to DynamoDB.
